text: Psalm 25
A Prayer for Guidance, Deliverance, and Forgiveness
Of David.\f + \fr Ps 25 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
To you, O Yahweh, I lift up my soul.
O my God, I trust you; let me not be put to shame.
Do not let my enemies exult over me.
Indeed, none who wait for you should be put to shame.
Those who betray without cause should be put to shame.
Make me know your ways, O Yahweh.
Teach me your paths.
Cause me to walk in your truth and teach me,
because you \add are\add* the God of my salvation.
I await you ⸤all day long⸥.\f + \fr 25:5 \ft Literally “all of the day” \f*
Remember your compassion, O Yahweh,
and your acts of loyal love,
because they \add are\add* from of old.
Do not remember
the sins of my youth or my transgressions.
According to your loyal love remember me \add if\add* you \add will\add*,
for the sake of your goodness, O Yahweh.
Good and right \add is\add* Yahweh;
therefore he instructs sinners in the way.
He causes \add the\add* humble to walk in justice,
and teaches \add the\add* humble his way.
All the paths of Yahweh \add are\add* loyal love and faithfulness
for those who keep his covenant and statutes.\f + \fr 25:10 \ft Or “covenant statutes” \f*
Also, for the sake of your name, O Yahweh,
forgive my sin, because it \add is\add* great.
Who \add is\add* the man fearing Yahweh?
He will instruct him in \add the\add* way he should choose.
His soul will lodge in prosperity,
and his offspring will possess \add the\add* land.
Intimate fellowship with Yahweh \add is\add* for those who fear him,
and \add he\add* makes known his covenant to them.
My eyes \add are\add* continually toward Yahweh,
because he will take my feet from \add the\add* net.
Turn to me and have mercy on me
because I \add am\add* lonely and afflicted.
Remove the troubles of my heart;
bring me out from my distresses.
Consider my affliction and trouble,
and forgive\f + \fr 25:18 \ft Or “take away” \f* all my sins.
Consider that my enemies are many,
and they hate me \add with\add* violent hatred.
Protect my life and deliver me.
Let me not be put to shame, because I take shelter in you.
Let integrity and uprightness preserve me,
because I wait for you.
O God, redeem Israel
from all its troubles.
